column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I see why this restaurant has such a long and rich history in Chicago
column2: because it is truly outstanding. My friend and I came for brunch recently
column3: and really loved our experience here. Making reservations was easy since they are on Open Table
column4: and I was able to snag us a table the day before our Saturday brunch. During brunch you have the options of choosing between the brunch items
column5: or the dinner items on the other side of the menu. The fact that there are so many options is dangerous
column6: because everything sounds delicious. I decided to focus on items from the brunch menu
column7: because I know I'll come another time to try the dinner items.
